column5: well ,the boy outfished the old man again,fished for pike with no success so we focused on catchin' smallies. 2nd cast......    we probably put a dozen in the boat,his caught on a dang worm,single hook,cost 2 cents,mine,10 4" senkos,$1o,go figure....my best...    all fish relating to rock structure,lots of algae,dont know if its just starting or finishing its cycle... talked to a local at the launch,walleye guy, trolls 13' to 20' on a long line,wally divers,perch pattern,slays em all day... 1.4 to 1.6 mph is essential,or, as he put it,you might as well put you're dick the water... all and all ,still a good day,better days to come soon.......
great report bud, but I think you put this in the wrong section.  Just copy and move it to General Discussion.  Joey
Great report.Its great when the little guys out fish their dad's. Keeps them interested in fishing. Thanks for sharing.
Dang, I was trolling to fast, sure felt good
Great report and pics mercforever  High five to your boy for outfishing you Thanks for sharing Leechman
